text: 'Impressive,' Lord Undertone said, gazing reverently on the cosmic handiwork. 'All those stars. But I'm a bit earthbound tonight, Trout. I've got a queer feeling, like I always get when something sensational's going to happen. There's things lurking if you ask me. Might be jaguar, might be... head-shrinkers.
